com.wizturn.sdk.central

Interface Central

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CentralManagerDelegate

    public interface Central
    Interface definition to define Central object.
    Author:
    jayjay

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Ends central role, in other words, releases all the resources being used.
      boolean connect(Peripheral peripheral, OnConnectListener listener)
      Connects to the given peripheral which supports GATT profile
      boolean connectWithDelay(Peripheral peripheral, OnConnectListener listener)
      Connects to the given peripheral which supports GATT profile after 500ms delay
      void disconnect()
      Disconnects to the current connection with a peripheral
      void disconnectWithDelay()
      Disconnects to the current connection with a peripheral after 500ms delay

      Gets an instance of BluetoothGattWriter to write characteristics, descriptions
      Peripheral getPeripheral(java.lang.String bdAddress)
      Returns a peripheral of which BD address matches
      boolean isConnected()
      Indicates whether the connection with the bluetooth device is now ongoing or not

      Sets PeripheralScanListener

      void stopScanning()
      Stops scanning Bluetooth devices
